title: "LoL has encountered a problem. Please re-install LoL to try again"
body: A few days ago I got my pc back from being repaired, guy at shop said the files were there but I'll have to reinstall the games (when I turned it on for the first time again none of my steam or blizzard games were there as well) so that was a bit annoying but oh well, yesterday my bro asks me if I want to reinstall LoL so we can play now that I have my pc again, so I tried to but after installing the game and pressing launch, a warning thing popped up and said what the title said, tried again and again but didn't work. Help?

replies.body: Some of those game files might have been left on your pc when it was repaired, so now when you tried installing again the installation directory has some extra or damaged files so it can't launch correctly. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and make sure to turn on both **reinstall AND clean uninstall**. That should be able to get you back on the Rift with your bro!
I really appreciate all the help and suggestions you gave me but after trying them all I still get the same result every time I try launching the game, would there be anything else I could try doing?

No worries! Go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the log files that HRT generated, and they'll be able to see exactly what was going wrong.
